import React, { useRef } from "react"; function SignupModal(props) { const usernameRef = useRef(); const passwordRef = useRef(); const firstNameRef = useRef(); const lastNameRef = useRef(); function handleFormSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault(); const username = usernameRef.current.value; const password = passwordRef.current.value; const firstName = firstNameRef.current.value; const lastName = lastNameRef.current.value; fetch('http://localhost:8080/registration', { method: 'POST', headers: { encoding: 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ username: username, password: password, firstName: firstName, lastName: lastName }) }) } return (

Sign Up

); } export default SignupModal;
